wikipedia_page.main: Jean Everald Tangye née Nicol (Jeannie) (23 March 1919 – 22 February 1986) was an author, illustrator and painter, who lived on a small holding near Lamorna Cove, west Cornwall in the United Kingdom. She was married to the writer Derek Tangye and appeared in (and illustrated) The Minack Chronicles, a series of books of their life together.
